description: Akonadi something something something service not running error from the first time I Try to even run the app! Really ?!
Same as Odi. So petty to have application in Discover that simply does not start.. :(
Does not even run after a fresh install!
Launching it from Plasma fails after a few seconds. Its taskbar window closes. I tried the terminal but it waits forever after displaying "Migrating tags, please wait..."

It is working but it is not very useful. I am trying to find a good CalDAV tasks client. It does sync and show my tasks, but it very inneficient at filtering. You cannot event see tasks from an specific list!
The application don't launch in KDE Neon. Launching the application in the terminal it keep displaying "Migrating tags, please wait..."
In order to make this thing work you need to have Korganizer installed.

installed very easily without a hitch. You have to assign your resources to make sure that the tasks have somewhere to end up in your calendars otherwise you will not be able to make tasks. I am not sure why the other reviewers have rated this app so low but it deserves a solid 5 stars. I have spent hundereds of dollars on Apps such Omnifocus for Mac, things and so on but this app is as solid as any of them. I wish to thank the developers. I would recommend people who write reviews to make sure that they do their due deligence beofre expressing their opnioins so unjustly.

It does not run on fresh install. WTH?

Then you waste time going thru these reviews and eventually find out that you need to install KOrganizer first.

Then, after that, KOrganizer is "Unable to start" any calendar. 

So after looking and looking in random forums I arrived to the inevitable conclusion: Linux is free... if you dont value your time.

AVOID THIS PIECE OF SOFTWARE.
I have installed version 0.5.71-3 on Debian Testing, and nothing happens at all when I launch it...
